12.SummaryEnglish: Taketo swears that he'll put everything he has into his lyrics. It's time for the final round of the Orientation Tournament. Each of the characters let go of everything they've been storing up inside them in one last, shocking song. It's a burning, passionate, and yet sweet melody of youth. Everybody feels something different, but they all want to say the same thing. "I love you!"
